content.name: Finding Users
content.detail_text:
To find a specific user, you can use either the simple or the advanced search mode.

  • Simple mode: in the filter form, specify the Department or the Last name and the First name to match an employee.

  • Advanced mode: to search for an employee, fill in any of the following fields in the filter form: Department, Position, Last name, First name, E-mail, Keywords.

The profiles which fit the search parameters will appear under the filter form:

Alternatively, you can find employees using the ABC panel. Click a letter to view the list of employees whose last name begins with the selected letter.

To switch the result view modes, use the List and Details buttons on the context toolbar:
